name: Umbra (Azul Mousseigne)
description:
The game was made in 48 hours, we entered the contest late but we found it a great challenge to make it in the time we had, it was very exciting! Although it is incomplete we want to show you our proposal. We will absolutely improve and update it. Thank you very much!

Amelie lives with her girlfriend Jane in a house on the outskirts of town. Due to Jane’s strange behavior in the last few days, Amelie is forced to investigate what is going on, examining the house for any clues or indications. She will soon realize something….
